column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We weren't very hungry but needed to try some of these excellent dishes. We ordered the grilled octopus first- the best octopus I have had. The texture was so deliciously chewy
column2: and the sauce flavorful and rich. Even the potatoes were excellent. We also ordered the cured salmon after seeing another party get it. It was like a Spanish version of lox
